name: condense-lambdas
description: TypeScript Lambda functions for Condense document summarization

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run package:all
scripts.package:all: npm run package:processing && npm run package:api && npm run package:chat
scripts.package:processing: npm run package:text-extractor && npm run package:text-chunker && npm run package:embeddings-generator && npm run package:summarizer && npm run package:status-updater && npm run package:sqs-processor
scripts.package:api: npm run package:upload-handler && npm run package:list-handler && npm run package:get-handler && npm run package:delete-handler && npm run package:status-handler && npm run package:profile-handler
scripts.package:chat: npm run package:chat-connect && npm run package:chat-disconnect && npm run package:chat-message && npm run package:chat-default && npm run package:chat-authorizer
scripts.package:text-extractor: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/text-extractor.zip text-extractor/
scripts.package:text-chunker: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/text-chunker.zip text-chunker/
scripts.package:embeddings-generator: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/embeddings-generator.zip embeddings-generator/
scripts.package:summarizer: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/summarizer.zip summarizer/
scripts.package:status-updater: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/status-updater.zip status-updater/
scripts.package:sqs-processor: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/sqs-processor.zip sqs-processor/
scripts.package:upload-handler: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/upload-handler.zip upload-handler/
scripts.package:list-handler: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/list-handler.zip list-handler/
scripts.package:get-handler: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/get-handler.zip get-handler/
scripts.package:delete-handler: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/delete-handler.zip delete-handler/
scripts.package:status-handler: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/status-handler.zip status-handler/
scripts.package:profile-handler: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/profile-handler.zip profile-handler/
scripts.package:chat-connect: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/chat-connect.zip chat-connect/
scripts.package:chat-disconnect: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/chat-disconnect.zip chat-disconnect/
scripts.package:chat-message: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/chat-message.zip chat-message/
scripts.package:chat-default: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && zip -r ../packages/chat-default.zip chat-default/
scripts.package:chat-authorizer: mkdir -p packages && cd dist && cp -r ../node_modules chat-authorizer/ && zip -r ../packages/chat-authorizer.zip chat-authorizer/ && rm -rf chat-authorizer/node_modules
